attributes.action: EFL and Premier League to end season and all clubs finish with current standings
attributes.additional_details: If the season gets cancelled, it is not fair on the supporters. Supporters have spent so much money this season to follow the teams. We should not let the virus win!!!
attributes.background: I want the government to end the football seasons now. The current standing of the clubs will be final.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
